description:
Through soul-stirring melodies, Rohirang celebrates the resilience of the
human spirit, weaving a tapestry of devotion, longing, and hope--an experience
that promises to uplift and inspire.
name: ROHIRANG ‘Colours Of The Desert’

performer.description: Mir Mukhtiyar Ali presents Rohirang—a musical journey that translates to "Colours of the Desert." The Rohi (desert) is an unforgiving landscape, vast and harsh, yet it holds within it a world of color and beauty—a metaphor for life’s challenges and its enduring vibrance. Drawing from the timeless compositions of mystics and saints like Bulleh Shah, Kabir, and Meerabai, Mukhtiyarji brings to life their wisdom—born from hardship yet steeped in boundless love and faith.
performer.name: Mir Mukhtiyar Ali

description:
Known for their unique interpretations of Tom Waits' music, VKB captivates
audiences with stunning three-part harmonies and inventive arrangements. Their
performances blend global percussion, squeezeboxes, acoustic guitars, banjos,
and playful surprises like bells and whistles, creating a rich, textured
sound.  
  
Recasting Waits' characters and melodies through a feminine lens, VKB delivers
tender yet powerful renditions that honor his vision while offering a fresh,
soulful perspective.
name: Vicki Kristina Barcelona Band

performer.description: Vicki Kristina Barcelona (VKB Band) is a dynamic New York City-based trio featuring Rachelle Garniez, Amanda Homi, and Mamie Minch—acclaimed singer-songwriters with a wealth of collective experience.
performer.name: Vicki Kristina Barcelona Band

description:
Led by Frankfurt-born guitarist Max Clouth, known for his double-necked
guitars and collaborations with Arijit Singh and Varijashree Venugopal, the
trio features tabla virtuoso Ishaan Ghosh, a prodigy from one of India's most
celebrated musical families, and bassist Vroni Frisch, a dynamic composer and
performer blending jazz, rock, and pop influences. Together, they create a
genre-defying experience that pushes musical boundaries and redefines sonic
storytelling.
name: NAYĀ DAY

performer.description: A fusion of jazz guitar, Indian ragas, tabla rhythms, and electronic textures, Nayā Day is a cinematic soundscape—an evocative soundtrack for an imagined journey between Germany and India.
performer.name: Max Clouth
